titles.title: Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors Act of 2005
To establish the Interagency Council on Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors, and for other purposes.
Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors Act of 2005

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

bill.summary: Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors Act of 2005 - Establishes in the executive branch the independent Interagency Council on Meeting the Housing and Service Needs of Seniors, which shall identify and promote coordination of senior citizen housing, health care, and service needs.
